alert.note: Alert for Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Upper Gunnison River Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 21 at 1:53PM MST until February 22 at 10:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 10 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 45 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin and Upper Gunnison River Valley. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 10 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers will also occur at times creating areas of near whiteout conditions with areas of Highway 50 over Cerro Summit especially impacted.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Upper Gunnison River Valley
